data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 69 believers in the state of Uruzgan to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Uruzgan, Afghanistan

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Uruzgan, Afghanistan will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Uruzgan
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Uruzgan, Afghanistan. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Deaf people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Deaf people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Deaf people is yours.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Uruzgan, Afghanistan, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Uruzgan, Afghanistan that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Uruzgan do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

location.name: Uruzgan
location.people_groups_list: Kurd, Central, Afshari, Bania (Muslim traditions), Arab, Tajiki, Garwi, Kohistani
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kurd, Central (4,000), Afshari (15,000), Bania (Muslim traditions) (6,400), Arab, Tajiki (18,000), Garwi, Kohistani (1,900)
